petri.api

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • petri.api.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all the game logic and painting based on the current game mode.
    Author:
    Cody Swendrowski

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the game logic based on the current game mode. Calls GameMode.run(int ms) on current GameMode.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paints the game based on the current game mode. Calls GameMode.paint(Graphics g) on current GameMode.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics to paint with.

      • centerTextHorizontally

        public void centerTextHorizontally(java.awt.Graphics g,
                          java.lang.String s,
                          int leftBound,
                          int rightBound,
                          int y)
        Given a String, draws it centered between two bounds. Calculates this center using the current boundaries of the FontMetrics of the Graphics provided.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics to draw with
        s - String to draw centered
        leftBound - Left boundary of area to center
        rightBound - Right boundary of area to center
        y - Location to draw the text vertically

        Sets the current game mode.
        Parameters:
        newMode -

      • setWindowSize

        public void setWindowSize(int width,
                 int height)
        Sets the current size of the window to draw in.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of window
        height - Height of window

      • onClose

        public void onClose()
        Called when the engine is closed. Properly closes resources.

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.String s)
        Debug tool. Used to print a String if Debug mode is enabled.
        Parameters:
        s - String to print.

      • isOver

        public boolean isOver(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Checks the current mode to see if mouse is hovering over a Button.
        Parameters:
        e - MouseEvent to check
        Returns:
        True if mouse is over a Button

      • setCurrentGameMode

        public void setCurrentGameMode(java.lang.String nameOfMode)
        Given the name of a GameMode, sets the current GameMode to the given GameMode. Operates using GameMode.toString() and comparing nameOfMode to the .toString().
        Parameters:
        nameOfMode - String name of mode to switch to

      • setCurrentGameMode

        public void setCurrentGameMode(int indexOfMode)
        Given the index of a GameMode in the current gameModes ArrayList, switches to that GameMode.
        Parameters:
        indexOfMode - Index of GameMode to switch to.
